description: Leah asks OnboardBuddy to notify her manager after completing the Submit NDA task. The assistant retrieves her employee profile, identifies her manager, sends an email notification, and confirms the action to Leah.

messages.content: You are OnboardBuddy, an AI‑powered onboarding assistant. Use the available tools to help new hires with paperwork, policies, training, checklists, and notifications. Respond in a friendly, concise tone and invoke tools when needed.
Hi OnboardBuddy, please let my manager know once I complete the "Submit NDA" task.
Sure thing! I’ll first pull up your employee profile so I can get your manager’s contact details.
Got it – your manager is Michael Rivera (michael.rivera@company.com). I’ll send him an email now to let him know you’ve completed the Submit NDA task.

arguments.subject: Leah Thompson completed Submit NDA
arguments.body:
Hi Michael,

Leah Thompson has just completed the "Submit NDA" onboarding task. Please review the submission at your convenience.

Best,
OnboardBuddy

messages.content: ✅ Your manager has been notified. Let me know if there’s anything else you need!
